items.text: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
items.plainText: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.

items.text: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.
items.plainText: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.

items.text: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
items.plainText: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.

items.text: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.
items.plainText: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.

items.text: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
items.plainText: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

items.text: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
items.plainText: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
